overview: I am a software developer based in Vancouver, Canada. I am passionate about making the world a better place through technology and creativity.

projects.title: Ecoation - Software Engineer Intern
projects.projectInfo: 1) Full-stack development on a responsive web application that presents users with real-time data visualization and interaction from machine learning models. 2) Work with data science team to develop serverless backend APIs. 3) Fix frontend and backend bugs and implement integration test. 4) Prepare technical documentation for the deployment, maintenance, and use of software.

projects.title: PCs4Kids - Game Developer
projects.projectInfo: My job as a game developer in this project includes: 1) planning and prototyping new applications; 2) designing the architecture of the components; 3) testing sites and applications in different browsers and environments and fixing bugs in existing projects.

projects.title: Kicktasks
projects.projectInfo: A single-page task management web application that combines a todolist, pomodoro and a goalmonitoring tool that works as scrum.

projects.title: Gomoku Game
projects.projectInfo: A Japanese strategy board game between two players.

projects.title: Battleship Game
projects.projectInfo: A guessing game for two players.

intro.description: My dream has been and always will be - making the world a better place for every creature on the planet to live on.

items.name: Education Equality
items.description: I work as a web developer for a non-profit organization called PCs4Kids that creates an amazing children-friendly software interface filled with a package of free educational software contents for children from Kindergarten to Grade 12 using recycled computers.

items.name: Environmental Protection
items.description: I work as a part-time marine Educator at Vancouver Aquarium Marine Science Center to teach younger generations how human activities can influence our planet earth.

items.name: Zero Hunger
items.description: For more than three years, I have been working as a radio host for a program named 'Free Lunch for Children', dedicated to providing free lunch to kids of underdeveloped areas in China.
